item.title: Project 3: Implementing Code Carbon's Energy Management
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has been revolutionary, but its rapid growth has come with significant environmental costs. Training and deploying large-scale AI models require substantial computational resources, resulting in increased energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. This tutorial addresses these challenges by introducing energy-efficient deep learning practices and tools to measure, analyze, and mitigate the carbon footprint of AI systems. The goals of this tutorial are: Educate participants on the environmental impact of AI and the importance of sustainable practices.
